Nicoll, Annie: New York, Ossining, & Shelter Island, NY
Nicoll, Annie: New York, Ossining, & Shelter Island, NY
1841 June 28; 1906 December 28; 1927 November 9; [no year] June 20 & July 8, circa 1920s

Addressed To: "Miss Cornelia [Conway Felton] Horsford, 27 Craigie Street, Cambridge, MA," "Sylvester Manor, Shelter Island," [NY]; "Miss Charlotte A. Nicoll, Albany," [NY], [Annie Nicoll's Mother's "Cousin Huntington," Wife of Judge H. of Troy, NY]

Sent From: "Miss Annie Nicoll, 104 East 79th Street, New York," [NY], "Bass Creek, Shelter Island, NY," "Grove Hill, Ossining, NY," [Cousin of Cornelia Conway Felton Horsford] ; [Annie Nicoll's Mother [Aunt of Cornelia Conway Felton Horsford]
